entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as the one who went on so long that Dumbledore had trouble making himself heard.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who tries to make himself heard after Cedric's long speech.

relationships.description: Dumbledore was interrupted by Cedric's long speech, as it took some time before Dumbledore could make himself heard again.
